name: Hover Dude
description:
Draw your path to victory in this frantic 1-v-1 battle for survival in the clouds. Inspired by Line Rider and Towerfall Ascension, you must outmaneuver your opponent, playing as the titular Hover Dude, or the other guy!

Created for the 2018 Wolverine Soft Pumpkin Jam by:

  • Vladimir Potiyevskiy
  • Loren Heubert-Aubry
  • Paul DeVito
  • Mingyang Xu
